name: RUFF TIME
description:
The spacetime continuum has been corrupted, and YOU must help fix it!

The universe is almost destroyed, Tim the Time Lord, keeper of the space time continuum is apparently not very good at his job, so he has required YOUR assistance on the case.

The world loop every 10 seconds, so you must you use time anomalies from the previous gameplay to solve puzzles and retrieve the 10 balance hourglasses.

Controls
 > WASD to move
> Q or Space to flip the hourglass
> E to interact with objects

- - - 

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 47, "Stuck in a Loop"
